parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and file name of the document from which to add the predefined drawing views to the View Palette

title: IDrawingDoc.GenerateViewPaletteViews
description: Adds the specified document's predefined drawing views to the View Palette.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and file name of the document from which to add the predefined drawing views to the View Palette

returns: True if the drawing views are added to the View Palette, false if not
